alert.note: Alert for Fannin; Murray (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 5:25PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Murray and northwestern Fannin Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 525 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Cisco, or 10 miles northeast of Chatsworth, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crandall, Conasauga Lake, Tennga, Jones Mill, Cisco, Colwell and Cohutta Wilderness. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for north central and northwestern Georgia.
